application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
T1 (sweet chestnut) - Pollard back to previous points.  Reduce height from 10 meters to 7.5 meters.  Reduce crown radius by 1.5m from 3m to 1.5m on all compass points.  Crown diameter 6m to 3m- remove all deadwood.  

T2 (Hazel) - Crown Reduce back to previous points. Reduce height from 3.5 meters to 2.5 meters. Crown reduce radius by 1m from 2m to 1m on all compass points.  Crown diameter 4m to 2m.  Remove all deadwood.

T3 (Hawthorne) - Crown Reduce back to previous points.  Reduce height from 4 meters to 2.5 meters. Crown reduce radius by 1m from 2m to 1m on all compass points (crown diameter 4m to 2m.  Remove all deadwood.

T4 (Hazel) - Crown reduce back to previous points.  Reduce height from 3.5 meters to 2.5 meters. Crown reduce radius by 1m from 2m to 1m on all compass points.  Crown diameter 4m to 2m.  Remove all deadwood.
decision_conditions: The works specified in this application should only be carried out strictly in accordance with British Standard 3998: 2010 'Tree Work Recommendations'.
